meanings.sent1: The factory desulfurs the oil before using it in production.
meanings.sent2: She desulfurs the water to make it safe for drinking.
meanings.sent3: The scientist desulfurs the soil to make it healthier for plants.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic desulfurs the fuel to keep the engine running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The farmer desulfurs the fertilizer to protect the crops from harm.

meanings.sent1: The metal desulfurs during the refining process.
meanings.sent2: The coal desulfurs naturally over time.
meanings.sent3: The air desulfurs as it travels through the purification system.
meanings.sent4: The water desulfurs as it passes through the filtration system.
meanings.sent5: The fuel desulfurs as it is processed for use in vehicles.
